SCTX:
begin Shishi_door

float timer
short doOnce

if ( doOnce == 2 )
	return
endif

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( OnActivate == 1 )
	if ( doOnce == 0 )
		PlaySound "Stone Door Open 1"
		set doOnce  to 1
	endif
endif
 
if ( doOnce == 1 )

	set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed

	if ( timer <= 1 )
		RotateWorld Z 90
	endif

	"in_velothi_platform_Shishi"->Move Z -50

	if ( timer > 5 )
		Set doOnce to 2
	endif

endif

end Shishi_door
